posts.title: Get AccessToken From Tidal
posts.text: AccessToken is a key to get the track\video streamurl. AccessToken from Tidal Desktop: Support MQA Flac, canâ€™t download 360\Dobly AccessToken from Tidal Android: Support all AccessToken from Tidal IOS: Canâ€™t download Flac How to use AccessToken. For tidal-dl: Open tidal-dl and Enter 10 to set AccessToken For tidal-gui: Open file tidal-ini and add a key â€œaccesstoken=xxxxxxxxxâ€ (xxxxxxx is your AccessToken) Get AccessToken from Tidal Android Login Tidal Android and play a track With any file explorer, go to /sdcard/Android/data/com.aspiro.tidal/cache/okhttp Open a file in the folder and Find the â€˜Authorization: Bearerâ€™ very_long_key (At the beginning of the file) very_long_key is what you need to copy/paste, if the file not contain the â€˜Authorization: Bearerâ€™, open another file. Get AccessToken from Tidal DesktopDownload Software Tidal Desktop Charles : View all of the HTTP and SSL / HTTPS traffic between their machine and the Internet Install Charles Install Charles Root Certificate Select menu: Help â€“> SSL Proxying â€“> Install Charles Root Certificate SSL Proxying Settings Select menu: Proxyâ€“>SSL Proxying Settings Open SSL Proxying page and follow picture settings Open Options Windows Proxy Start Recording Start SSL Proxying External Proxy Settings (If you need VPN to use Tidal Desktop) Select menu: Proxyâ€“>Proxying Settings Open Proxies page \ Windows page and follow picture settings Select menu: Proxyâ€“>External Proxying Settings Follow picture settings (IP and Port come from your VPN) Get AccessToken Install Charles and Open it Open Tidal Desktop Charles will view all of the HTTP / HTTPS traffic between tidal and the Internet. Relogin on the Tidal Desktop and play a track â€˜Ctrl + Fâ€™ on the Charles Enter â€˜authorization: Bearerâ€™ or â€˜authorizationâ€™ and click Find-Button Select url contains â€˜tidalâ€™ Double click the selection Select Contents page copy the authorization (remove â€˜Bearer â€˜) Q&A Follow documentation but I canâ€™t get the AccessTokenâ€™ Google how to use Charles. How to get AccessToken from Tidal IOS Google Charles IOS.

posts.title: Tidal-Media-Downloader Installation Documentation
posts.text: Tidal-Media-Downloader is an application that lets you download videosã€tracksã€playlistã€album and artistâ€™s album from Tidal Website Have two versionï¼š Tidal-dl: cliï¼Œsupport windows\linux\macos\android Tidal-gui: guiï¼Œsupport windows ğŸ‰Tidal-dl InstallSelect the installation steps according to the computer system Windowsï¼štidal-dl.exe Linux: pip3 install tidal-dl --upgrade MacOs: 12345678brew instal ffmpegbrew install pythoncurl -O http://python-distribute.org/distribute_setup.pypython distribute_setup.pycurl -O https://raw.github.com/pypa/pip/master/contrib/get-pip.pypython get-pip.pypip3 install --upgrade tidal-dltidal-dl Android: a). Install termuxï¼šhttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.termux b). Open permissionï¼štermux-setup-storage c). Install pythonå’Œtidal-dl 1234567pkg install python clang libjpeg-turbo ffmpeg zlib -yapt updateapt upgradepkg updatepip3 install --upgrade pippip3 install --upgrade tidal-dltidal-dl Use Enter username and password. Type â€˜2â€™ and enterï¼Œset config file Name Function Download path File save directory Audio quality Track quality Video quality Support 1080\720\480\360\240 Add hyphens â€˜-â€˜ between number and title, likeâ€˜01-Yellow.m4aâ€™ Convert mp4 to m4a Convert mp4 to m4a(Only track) Add year before or after the name of album directory Add explicit tag likeâ€˜01-Yellow-explicit.m4aâ€™ Include singles download artist EP&Single Save covers Cover-Files are saved in the album directory Artist name before track-title Add artist name before the track-file-name ID before album-folder like â€˜[20495848] Wretched and Divineâ€™ Audio quailty: Master > HiFi > High > Normal Audio Quality Format Normal mp4 or m4a High mp4 or m4a HiFi mp4 or m4a or flac Master(BEST) flac Type track\video\album\playlist\artist url to download ğŸ•Tidal-guiBecause the gui more cumbersome to do, it is generally tidal-dl that adds new features first, and then gui follows up. Therefore it is recommended to use tidal-dl. Download Tidal-gui Open tidal-gui and set https-proxy and login Type track\video\album\playlist\artist url to download ğŸ’Disclaimer Music is not free, need a HIFI account. Private use only.
